title: Robotic Force Control Algorithm Design: Utilizing Reinforcement Learning and RBF Neural Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Training for pre-service and in-service teachers on robotic force control principles and algorithms to develop the ability to apply them in real educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of a force control algorithm combining reinforcement learning and RBF neural networks.
Learners can design a force control system that adaptively responds to unknown environmental stiffness in a simulation environment.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate algorithm performance (average error rate within 0.5N) by analyzing experimental data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
